column7: The University of Illinois Percussion Ensemble specializes in the performance of contemporary and traditional repertoire for small and large ensembles. Percussion majors are automatically accepted into the Percussion Ensemble. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate semesters to a maximum of 8 undergraduate hours or 6 graduate hours. Prerequisite: Audition and/or consent of instructor.
